p: Nutraceuticals, such as soya bean, garlic, ginger, green tea, propolis, honey, RES, Q, EGCG, etc., may have chemopreventive effects. They are able to induce the apoptosis of cancer cells. These special foods can be used for chemoprevention or as a supportive therapy at treatment of tumor by standard anticancer chemotherapeutics [ 175, 176, 177, 178, 179, 180].
